name: Vampire Tunnels
description:
When something is lost, sometimes you might find yourself venturing through the snaking tunnels of the underworld.

Sometimes the things you find are terrifying: sometimes they fill you with wonder.

Whatever you find, the Vampyre Grimoire will help you face it.  It's a spellbook, capable of transforming your pathetic weapons into fearsome demon-slayers, if only for a moment.

There's only one problem...

Every life you take with the Grimoire changes it forever, and every change to the Grimoire alters the world around it... so take care!
